mapper.insert: insert into t_board set title = #{title}, ctnt = #{ctnt}, iuser = #{iuser}
mapper.select: SELECT A.iboard, A.title, A.ctnt,B.nm,B.main_pic FROM t_board A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser ORDER BY iboard LIMIT #{startIdx},#{row}
SELECT A.iboard, A.title,A.ctnt,B.nm ,A.created_at , A.updated_at FROM t_board A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE iboard = ${iboard};
mapper.update: update t_board set title = #{title}, ctnt = #{ctnt}, updated_at = current_timestamp() where iboard = #{iboard}
